description: This earthy mushroom and lentil stew is a vegan one pot wonder packed with veggie goodness.
keywords: Vegetable stew,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Mushroom,Halal,One-pot,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Kale,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: One Pot Mushroom & Lentil Stew Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the dried mushrooms in a bowl covered with boiling water and steep for 10 minutes. Cook the lentils to the boil in a large pan of boiling water and cook for 10 minutes, drain and pour into a large pan with the dried mushrooms and soaking liquid. Pour over the vegetable stock, add thyme and simmer with the lid on for 20 minutes.
Heat the oil in a pan on medium high heat and cook the onions and portobello mushrooms for 10 minutes. Stir in the garlic and cook for 2 minutes.
Remove the thyme and stir the lentil mixture into the pan with the mushrooms. Add the chopped celeriac and cook for 20 minutes until the lentils and celeriac are both completely tender.
Stir in the kale and cook for 5 minutes, until wilted, and serve.
